Comment: This game is included because of a possibility which came up. What I want you to do is to play through this and tell me what you would have done if White had played a differently on move 14.
My usual Sicilian
This is not too bad, although not very common, as it is not very aggressive.
And this is bad, developing the knight to a bad square. The knight belongs on c3 or d2 where it has move influence on the centre.

I would not normally play this, as normally Black can just exchange pawns and play Nc3, but with the knight on a3 this is good.
I don't like this move either, Bd2 perhaps is better?
